CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 3, 1945, pg. 22, reads: "'Y' Hostess Club - Members of the Centre Avenue YMCA Hostess Club, who will entertain with the 'Y' Varsity Club at the annual Sweetheart's Hop, on Friday, Feb. 9. The affair is held as part of the St. Valentine's Day celebration. Mrs. Juanita Fountain and Mrs. Thelma Burgess are advisors to the 'Y' Hostess Club. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of Centre Avenue YMCA Hostess Club, possibly including Marilyn Ware second from left, June Tansimore sixth, Marguerite Dodson tenth, Lois Weaver (Watson) twelfth, and Beverly Moss fourteenth from left, posed in gymnasium
